title: 820 2915 - fine lines across screen
message:
15 inch macbook pro sn c02hd7u5dv7l
fine lines across screen from left right, looks like it could be the vga processor to me, everything looks ok with lids connector and cable etc... any point in looking further or is it the usual graphics issue for this build? It only goes as far as a question mark folder on screen as it does not have the hard drive in
Thanks in advance

title: 820 2915 - fine lines across screen
message: Just for test apply some heat to the core of GPU, buit this is a GPU problem...

title: 820 2915 - fine lines across screen
message: It'll be the GPU of course.

title: 820 2915 - fine lines across screen
message: I have said goodbye to it
